snippet: Kyle Busch pulled away from Kevin Harvick after a late wreck took out several of the leaders Saturday night, finally winning a Nascar Sprint Cup race after years of misfortune.
abstract: Kyle Busch wins Nascar Sprint Cup race at Kansas Speedway.
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch pulled away from Kevin Harvick after a late wreck took out several of the leaders Saturday night, finally winning a Nascar Sprint Cup race after years of misfortune.

headline.main: Kyle Busch Wins Nascar Sprint Cup Race in Kansas
